thread.title: Commonwealth Hotels Names Director of Sales and Marketing for Candlewood Suites Carrollton
thread.title_full: Commonwealth Hotels Names Director of Sales and Marketing for Candlewood Suites Carrollton - CBS News 8 - San Diego, CA News Station - KFMB Channel 8

author: cbs8
title: Commonwealth Hotels Names Director of Sales and Marketing for Candlewood Suites Carrollton
text:
Commonwealth Hotels, LLC
COVINGTON, Ky. , Sept. 3, Commonwealth Hotels, LLC is pleased to announce that Deborah Borsch will be the Director of Sales and Marketing for the new Candlewood Suites Carrollton , effective immediately. As Director of Sales, Borsch will direct all area of the hotel's sales and marketing efforts. "We are confident that Deborah will be instrumental in ensuring the success of Candlewood Suites Carrollton," said Brian Fry , President of Commonwealth Hotels.
Prior to assuming her role as the Director of Sales, Deborah contributed to the success of the hotel through the opening process as a Guest Service Representative. Deborah's dedication and commitment is evident in her nine years of experience in coordinating and relationship building with the Walmart Corporation. "I am very excited to continue to foster and grow my relationships with our community and businesses," Borsch says. "We have so much to offer our guests and companies coming to the area for work and leisure."
Deborah enjoys family, outdoor activities, being an active member in the community and supporting her children and husband.
About IHG Hotels
Today InterContinental Hotels Group is one of the world's leading hotel companies with over 4,900 IHG hotels in nearly 100 countries and territories and a portfolio of nine preferred brands: InterContinental Hotels and Resorts, Holiday Inn, Crowne Plaza, Holiday Inn Express, Staybridge Suites, Candlewood Suites, Hotel Indigo, Hualuxe Hotels and Resorts and EVEN Hotels. IHG Rewards Club has been chosen by more travelers than any other hotel loyalty program worldwide. IHG's hotel development pipeline is the industry's largest, with 1,293 hotels (214,134 rooms).
About the Candlewood Suites Carrollton
The Candlewood Suites opened January 2015 with 100 fully equipped suites. The hotel is located at 1296 Canton Road, Carrollton, OH 44615. Just minutes from I-77, located in Carrollton , Candlewood Suites gives guests the amenities that make them feel at home. When it's time to get connected Candlewood Suites Carrollton knows guests need high speed Internet, cable, sports and movie channels. And when guests need to burn some energy the fully equipped Fitness Center will help melt the stress away. Suites are fully equipped with room to spread out, space to work and space to relax. The location offers great shopping, dining and entertainment in Carrollton . When you come to Carroll County , your best stay for a week, a month or even a year is at Candlewood Suites.
For more hotel information contact the sales office at 330-627-1562 or online at http://www.ihg.com/candlewood/hotels/us/en/carrollton/cakcr/hoteldetail
About Commonwealth Hotels LLC
Commonwealth Hotels, LLC was founded in 1986 and is a proven partner in providing management services and superior financial results. The company has extensive experience managing premium branded full service and select service hotels. Commonwealth Hotels currently manages over 4,500 rooms with 5 additional hotels under development or construction.
Additional corporate information on Commonwealth Hotels may be found at www.commonwealthhotels.com .
CONTACT:
Jennifer Schneider
Commonwealth Hotels, LLC
859-392-2245
